criteria.name: Intensity
criteria.description: The intensity level of the exercise (low, Moderate, high)

criteria.name: Target Muscle Groups
criteria.description: The number and variety of muscle groups targeted by the exercise

criteria.name: Duration
criteria.description: The recommended duration of the exercise session

criteria.name: Benefits
criteria.description: The overall benefits of the exercise (e.g., strength, endurance, flexibility)

criteria.name: Calories Burned
criteria.description: The estimated number of calories burned per hour
